code: import{rooms}from'../../database/roomsData';import{getBool,ToWordNumber,getRandomElement}from'../../utils';var getQuestion=function getQuestion(){var isPlural=getBool();var quantity=Math.floor(Math.random()*7)+1;var quantifier=isPlural?ToWordNumber(quantity):'a';var room=getRandomElement(rooms);var furniture=getRandomElement(room.furniture);var isAffirmative=getBool();var prompt="".concat(isPlural?"Are":"Is"," ").concat(quantifier," ").concat(furniture).concat(isPlural?'s':''," in your ").concat(room.name,"? / ").concat(isAffirmative?'Affirmative':'Negative');var answer="".concat(isAffirmative?"Yes":"No",", there ").concat(isPlural?"are":"is").concat(isAffirmative?'':"n't",".");return{prompt:prompt,answer:answer};};export default getQuestion;
